Issue.creator: JIRAUSER21321
Issue.description: In the "commercial paper" example in the fabric-samples project the java applications cannot resolve the hostnames of the fabric nodes in docker. Adding a rout to localhost in /etc/hosts resolves this problem, however the javascript version of the same example can resolve the hosts out of the box, which leaves the user irritated. I'm using mac os 10.15.7 and docker desktop 3.1.0
